title: Vatican indicts 10 people, including a cardinal, over an international financial scandal
content:
1. Vatican indicts 10 people, including a cardinal, over an international financial scandal  CNN
  2. Vatican embezzlement trial: Cardinal Angelo Becciu among 10 charged  BBC News
  3. Vatican indicts 10, including a cardinal, in London deal  Yahoo News
  4. Vatican indicts 10 on charges connected to London property deal  Clacton and Frinton Gazette
  5. The Vatican Indicts 10, Including A Former Cardinal, Over A London Real Estate Deal  NPR
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
